languages.text: "Я слышала, как правительница отдавала приказы... она называла их "нововведениями лучших умов Януса". Что за умы обрекают себе подобных на такой скорбный удел?"

traits.locale_text: "Я слышала, как правительница отдавала приказы... она называла их "нововведениями лучших умов Януса". Что за умы обрекают себе подобных на такой скорбный удел?"

languages.text: "I heard the ruler giving out orders... She called them the 'innovations of the finest minds on Janus.' What minds would condemn themselves to such a woeful fate?"
languages.original_text: "Я слышала, как правительница отдавала приказы... она называла их "нововведениями лучших умов Януса". Что за умы обрекают себе подобных на такой скорбный удел?"

traits.locale_text: "I heard the ruler giving out orders... She called them the 'innovations of the finest minds on Janus.' What minds would condemn themselves to such a woeful fate?"
"I heard the ruler giving out orders... She called them the 'innovations of the finest minds on Janus.' What minds would condemn themselves to such a woeful fate?"
"I heard the ruler giving out orders... She called them the 'innovations of the finest minds on Janus.' What minds would condemn themselves to such a woeful fate?"
"I heard the ruler giving out orders... She called them the 'innovations of the finest minds on Janus.' What minds would condemn themselves to such a woeful fate?"

languages.text: “我听到过总督发布命令……她称这些命令为‘整个加努斯最出色的头脑带来的创新’。究竟是什么人，才会甘愿让自己遭受如此悲惨的命运？”
languages.original_text: "I heard the ruler giving out orders... She called them the 'innovations of the finest minds on Janus.' What minds would condemn themselves to such a woeful fate?"

traits.locale_text: “我听到过总督发布命令……她称这些命令为‘整个加努斯最出色的头脑带来的创新’。究竟是什么人，才会甘愿让自己遭受如此悲惨的命运？”

languages.text: 「ヤヌスの支配者が命じるのを聞いた…総督はその行いを『ヤヌスにおける至高の精神革新』と称していた。そのような悲惨な運命に殉じる精神とは何だ？」
languages.original_text: "I heard the ruler giving out orders... She called them the 'innovations of the finest minds on Janus.' What minds would condemn themselves to such a woeful fate?"

traits.locale_text: 「ヤヌスの支配者が命じるのを聞いた…総督はその行いを『ヤヌスにおける至高の精神革新』と称していた。そのような悲惨な運命に殉じる精神とは何だ？」

languages.text: "Ich habe gehört, wie die Herrscherin Befehle erteilt hat ... Sie nannte sie 'Innovationen der hellsten Köpfe auf Janus'. Welche Köpfe würden sich selbst zu einem so schrecklichen Schicksal verurteilen?"
languages.original_text: "I heard the ruler giving out orders... She called them the 'innovations of the finest minds on Janus.' What minds would condemn themselves to such a woeful fate?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe gehört, wie die Herrscherin Befehle erteilt hat ... Sie nannte sie 'Innovationen der hellsten Köpfe auf Janus'. Welche Köpfe würden sich selbst zu einem so schrecklichen Schicksal verurteilen?"

languages.text: « J'ai entendu la dirigeante donner des ordres de ce genre... Elle appelait ça les "innovations des esprits les plus brillants de Janus." Quels esprits pourraient se condamner à un sort aussi abominable ? »
languages.original_text: "I heard the ruler giving out orders... She called them the 'innovations of the finest minds on Janus.' What minds would condemn themselves to such a woeful fate?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai entendu la dirigeante donner des ordres de ce genre... Elle appelait ça les "innovations des esprits les plus brillants de Janus." Quels esprits pourraient se condamner à un sort aussi abominable ? »

languages.text: «He oído a la gobernante dar las órdenes... Las llamaba las "innovaciones de las mejores mentes de Janus". ¿Qué mentes se condenan a un destino tan lamentable?».
languages.original_text: "I heard the ruler giving out orders... She called them the 'innovations of the finest minds on Janus.' What minds would condemn themselves to such a woeful fate?"

traits.locale_text: «He oído a la gobernante dar las órdenes... Las llamaba las "innovaciones de las mejores mentes de Janus". ¿Qué mentes se condenan a un destino tan lamentable?».

languages.text: "Hükümdarın emirlerini duydum... 'Janus'taki en pırıl pırıl akılların icadı' dedi buna. Nasıl bir akıl, kendi kendini böylesine acıklı bir kadere mahkûm eder ki?"
languages.original_text: "I heard the ruler giving out orders... She called them the 'innovations of the finest minds on Janus.' What minds would condemn themselves to such a woeful fate?"

traits.locale_text: "Hükümdarın emirlerini duydum... 'Janus'taki en pırıl pırıl akılların icadı' dedi buna. Nasıl bir akıl, kendi kendini böylesine acıklı bir kadere mahkûm eder ki?"
